Package us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics

package us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    us.stomberg.solarsystemsim
     
    us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.graphics
     
    us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.interaction
     
  • Class
    Description
    Body
    Stores and updates physical information about a body.
    BodyBuilder
    A builder class for creating instances of the Body class.
    BodyFactory
    Factory class that provides default celestial bodies with realistic properties.
    BodyHistory
    The BodyHistory class provides a mechanism for tracking the position, velocity, and acceleration history of a physics body over a fixed number of time steps.
    BodyHistory.State
    Immutable record representing a complete state snapshot of a body at a point in time.
    CollisionDetector
    The CollisionDetector class is responsible for detecting collisions between celestial bodies in the physics simulation.
    CollisionEvent
    The CollisionEvent class represents a collision between two celestial bodies in the simulation.
    ExplicitEulerIntegrator
    Implementation of the Integrator interface using the Explicit Euler method.
    GravityCalculator
    The GravityCalculator class calculates gravitational forces between celestial bodies in the simulation using Newton's law of universal gravitation.
    Integrator
    The Integrator interface defines the numerical integration methods used to simulate the motion of celestial bodies in a physics simulation.
    Physics
    The Physics class manages all physical interactions between celestial bodies in the simulation.
    SymplecticEulerIntegrator
    Implementation of the Integrator interface using the Symplectic Euler method, also known as Semi-implicit Euler method.
    TimeStep
    The TimeStep class manages the temporal progression of the physics simulation.
    Vector3D
    The Vector3D class represents a three-dimensional vector with x, y, and z components.
    VerletIntegrator
    Implementation of the Integrator interface using the Velocity Verlet algorithm.
